allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement comprehensive visa interview system enhancements

Major Features:
1. Citizenship-based automatic visa filtering
   - E-3 auto-eliminated for non-Australians
   - TN auto-eliminated for non-Canadian/Mexican
   - H-1B1 auto-eliminated for non-Chilean/Singaporean
   - Uses citizenship enrichment from user registration

2. Employment visa filtering improvements
   - EB- visas (EB-1, EB-2, EB-3, EB-4) properly eliminated for employment purpose
   - Added P-1, P-2, P-3 visa filtering logic for athletes/entertainers
   - Added H-1B1 filtering for Chilean/Singaporean specialty workers
   - Fixed L-1A/L-1B differentiation to return visa code instead of name

3. Interview workflow enhancements
   - Added reset warning when restarting interview with existing visa type
   - Implemented direct visa selection from remaining options (hover to reveal)
   - Added confirmation modal for direct visa selection
   - Fixed interview completion flow and loading state management

4. Question ordering and skip logic
   - Skip managerialRole question when no L-1 visas possible
   - Skip athleteOrEntertainer when no P visas possible
   - Skip reciprocalExchange when P-2 not possible
   - Skip culturallyUnique when P-3 not possible
   - Removed citizenship questions from flow (auto-enriched)

API Endpoints Added:
- POST /api/v1/cases/{id}/reset-visa-type - Reset visa type and interview progress
- POST /api/v1/interview/select-visa-type - Directly select visa type from remaining options

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed "Next Question" button loading state issue (now uses finally block)
- Fixed visa type recommendation to return code (L-1A, L-1B) instead of full name
- Fixed early interview completion when both L-1A and L-1B present
- Fixed hover dropdown visibility for clickable visa chips
- Added proper error handling and logging throughout interview flow

Technical Improvements:
- Enhanced AdaptiveInterviewService with comprehensive visa filtering
- Added new interview questions: athleteOrEntertainer, reciprocalExchange, culturallyUnique
- Improved question ordering for employment category
- Added SelectVisaTypeRequest DTO model
- Updated frontend to show remaining visas as hoverable chips
- Improved modal UX with clear disclaimers about suggestions vs legal advice

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
